code: @Override protected void execute(Terminal terminal, OptionSet options, Environment env) throws Exception {     List<String> settings = arguments.values(options).     if (settings.isEmpty()) {         throw new UserException(ExitCodes.USAGE, "Must supply at least one setting to remove").     }     KeyStoreWrapper keystore = KeyStoreWrapper.load(env.configFile()).     if (keystore == null) {         throw new UserException(ExitCodes.DATA_ERROR, "Elasticsearch keystore not found. Use 'create' command to create one.").     }     keystore.decrypt(new char[0]).     for (String setting : arguments.values(options)) {         if (keystore.getSettingNames().contains(setting) == false) {             throw new UserException(ExitCodes.CONFIG, "Setting [" + setting + "] does not exist in the keystore.").         }         keystore.remove(setting).     }     keystore.save(env.configFile(), new char[0]). }
